alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 07 at 12:42PM AKST until December 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow and low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. Visibility as low as one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow squalls will come with heavy snow, strong winds becoming north and whiteout conditions at times beginning this afternoon and continuing through Saturday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
